sections.heading: What is だから?
sections.content:
だから is a sentence connector meaning "therefore," "that's why," "so," or "because of that." It shows cause-and-effect relationships, where the second sentence is a result or consequence of the first. It's casual and commonly used in conversation.

疲れた。だから休む。 "I'm tired. Therefore, I'll rest." 雨だ。だから傘を持って行く。 "It's raining. So I'll take an umbrella."

children.heading: Cause and effect
children.content: お腹が空いた。だから食べる。 "I'm hungry. That's why I'll eat." 忙しい。だから行けない。 "I'm busy. So I can't go." Result follows reason

children.heading: Explaining reasons
children.content: 寒い。だからコートを着る。 "It's cold. That's why I'm wearing a coat." 高い。だから買わない。 "It's expensive. So I won't buy it." Justifying action

children.heading: Beginning of second sentence
children.content: 疲れた。だから寝る。 "I'm tired. Therefore, I'll sleep." After period New sentence

children.heading: だから = casual
children.content: 忙しい。だから行けない。 "I'm busy. So I can't go." Conversational tone

children.heading: ですから = polite
children.content: 忙しいです。ですから行けません。 "I'm busy. Therefore, I can't go." Polite version

children.heading: だから with polite endings
children.content: 忙しい。だから行けません。 "I'm busy. So I can't go." Mixed style common

children.heading: Explaining decisions
children.content: 明日テストがある。だから今日は勉強する。 "I have a test tomorrow. That's why I'll study today." Justifying choices

children.heading: Refusing invitations
children.content: A: 映画に行かない？ B: 疲れてる。だから今日はやめとく。 A: "Want to go to a movie?" B: "I'm tired. So I'll pass today." Giving reasons for "no"

children.heading: Daily reasoning
children.content: 雨だ。だから家にいる。 "It's raining. So I'm staying home." Everyday logic

sections.heading: だから vs それで

children.heading: だから = that's why (emphasis on reason)
children.content: 疲れた。だから休む。 "I'm tired. That's why I'll rest." Strong causal link Personal reasoning

children.heading: それで = and so/then (emphasis on result)
children.content: 疲れた。それで休むことにした。 "I was tired. And so I decided to rest." Neutral narration Sequence of events

children.heading: Starting explanation
children.content: A: なぜ来なかった？ B: だから、忙しかったんだよ。 A: "Why didn't you come?" B: "That's why—I was busy." Emphasizing reason

children.heading: Expressing frustration
children.content: だから言ったでしょう！ "That's why I told you!" Emphatic, annoyed tone "I told you so"

children.heading: から = within sentence
children.content: 疲れたから休む。 "I'll rest because I'm tired." Single sentence Direct connection

children.heading: だから = between sentences
children.content: 疲れた。だから休む。 "I'm tired. Therefore, I'll rest." Two sentences Stronger separation

children.heading: Drawing conclusions
children.content: 彼は毎日練習している。だから上手だ。 "He practices every day. That's why he's good." Logical result

children.heading: Works with negatives
children.content: お金がない。だから買えない。 "I don't have money. So I can't buy it." 時間がない。だから行かない。 "I don't have time. So I won't go." Negative cause and effect

children.heading: したがって (therefore - formal)
children.content: 利益が減少した。したがって対策が必要だ。 "Profits decreased. Therefore, countermeasures are necessary." Written, formal

children.heading: そのため (for that reason - formal)
children.content: 天候が悪化した。そのため中止となった。 "The weather worsened. For that reason, it was canceled." Formal reports

children.heading: Using within same sentence
children.content: Wrong: 疲れただから休む ⚠️ Correct: 疲れた。だから休む。 ✓ Or: 疲れたから休む。 ✓ Need sentence break or use から

children.heading: Confusing with ですから in casual speech
children.content: Unnatural: 疲れた。ですから休む。△ Natural: 疲れた。だから休む。✓ "I'm tired. So I'll rest." ですから too formal for casual context

children.heading: だからこそ (precisely because)
children.content: 難しい。だからこそ挑戦したい。 "It's difficult. Precisely because of that, I want to challenge it." Strong emphasis

children.heading: だからね (you see/you know)
children.content: だからね、そういうことなんだ。 "So you see, that's how it is." Softening, explanatory

children.heading: Making a point
children.content: A: 行くべきだよ。 B: だから、時間がないって言ってるでしょう。 A: "You should go." B: "That's why I'm saying I don't have time." Assertive reasoning

children.heading: Sequential reasoning
children.content: 疲れた。だから休む。だから明日頑張れる。 "I'm tired. So I'll rest. So I can work hard tomorrow." Chain of reasons Can be excessive

children.heading: Continuing from context
children.content: だから、昨日の話だけど... "So, about yesterday's topic..." Resuming discussion

children.heading: Expressing annoyance
children.content: だから言ったじゃない！ "That's why I said it!" "I told you so" feeling Frustrated tone

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 疲れた。だから休む。 "I'm tired. So I'll rest." 雨だ。だから傘を持つ。 "It's raining. So I'll take an umbrella." 忙しい。だから行けない。 "I'm busy. So I can't go." お腹が空いた。だから食べる。 "I'm hungry. So I'll eat."

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 明日は大切な試験がある。だから今日は 早く寝たほうがいい。十分な睡眠を 取ることが大事だ。 "I have an important exam tomorrow. So I should go to bed early today. Getting enough sleep is important." この仕事は難しい。だから時間がかかる。 でも諦めずに続ければ、必ずできるように なる。 "This work
